channel.title: TRBC - Video Podcast
channel.description: This is a weekly listing of the live sermons from the Sanctuary of Thomas Road Baptist Church in Lynchburg, Virginia, USA where Jonathan Falwell is pastor.
channel.itunes:summary: This is a weekly listing of the live sermons from the Sanctuary of Thomas Road Baptist Church in Lynchburg, Virginia, USA where Jonathan Falwell is pastor.
channel.itunes:author: Thomas Road Baptist Church
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video Sermons from Thomas Road Baptist Church
channel.itunes:keywords: trbc, jonathan, falwell, lynchburg, virginia, thomas, road, christian, life, bible, prayer, sin
